about_the_game:
::PLEASE NOTE::

This game may be upsetting to individuals who have dealt or are dealing with mental health issues. It does the best it can to represent the thoughts and feelings of those suffering with these conditions: as its characters are informed by real people.

Gameplay here is primarily similar to that of a walking sim, the hope is that you feel relaxed while navigating the dreamscape. This way you can get into a good headspace to find your own interpretations of the dialogue presented.

Otherwise, there are a few puzzles to complete along the way. Pay close attention to how it feels to solve these: as it should feel like a diluted version of the real conditions represented.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains clear and metaphorical reference to various mental health conditions. You may not wish to play if you have struggled / are struggling with your own mental health, as the topics covered could be upsetting for you.
